display_name: [Captain's Ace in the Hole] Captain Ginyu

kit.leader_skill: "Terrifying Conquerors" or "Planet Namek Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category

super_attack.name: Milky Cannon (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises DEF; Raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: True Value of the Force
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 20% up; (Forever) "Ginyu Force" Category allies' Ki +1, ATK & DEF 60% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up; Per "Ginyu Force" Category ally on the team: ATK & DEF 20% up (up to 100%); When there is another "Ginyu Force" Category ally on the team: Attacks are effective against all Types; High chance of launching an additional Super Attack; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn, or when HP is 70% or more at the start of turn: Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 30% up

lines.text: ATK & DEF 200% up
Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
Damage reduction rate 20% up
"Ginyu Force" Category allies' Ki +1, ATK & DEF 60% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up
ATK & DEF 150% up
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK & DEF 20% up (up to 100%)
lines.context: Per "Ginyu Force" Category ally on the team

lines.text: Attacks are effective against all Types
lines.context: When there is another "Ginyu Force" Category ally on the team

lines.text: High chance of launching an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When there is another "Ginyu Force" Category ally on the team

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 30% up
lines.context: For 1 turn from the character's entry turn, or when HP is 70% or more at the start of turn

active_skill.name: Body Change
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 70% or less starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle (once only)
